reviews.text: If you're looking for a delicious and unique dining experience in Grandview Heights, Ohio, look no further than Figlio. This local favorite is known for its...
This was my first time at Figlio's and I enjoyed it! The atmosphere was nice but a little worn down, like it needed a new coat of paint and updated wall...
This is probably my very favorite restaurant in town. It's consistently delicious. I have celiac and this is a restaurant I can go to and enjoy and feel...
